Detailed Description

Abstract super for encryptors using a fix key.

bool KeyEncryptorDecryptor::decrypt (  const MC2String &  inID,
MC2String &  outID
) 
 

Decrypts a string.

Parameters:
inID The string to decrypt in base64 format.
outID The decrypted string.
Returns:
True if decryption succeeded and outID is set, false if not.

MC2String &  outID
) 
 

Encrypts a string.

Parameters:
inID The string to encrypt.
outID The encrypted string in base64 format.
Returns:
True if encryption succeeded and outID is set, false if not.
